thread.title: BRIEF-Concerned Shareholders Of Alexandria Minerals Announce Intention To Requisition Shareholder Meeting

title: BRIEF-Concerned Shareholders Of Alexandria Minerals Announce Intention To Requisition Shareholder Meeting
text:
February 9, 2018 / 12:17 PM / in 22 minutes BRIEF-Concerned Shareholders Of Alexandria Minerals Announce Intention To Requisition Shareholder Meeting Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Alexandria Minerals Corp: 
* CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS SAYS THEY INTEND TO DELIVER A REQUISITION TO CO, DIRECTORS REQUISITIONING A SPECIAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS 
* ‍CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS - MEETING IS BEING CALLED TO REPLACE 3 INCUMBENT DIRECTORS, PETER GUNDY, WALTER HENRY AND GARY O‘CONNOR​ 
* ‍CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS - TO REPLACE DIRECTORS WITH CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS’ NOMINEES IAN MELLON, CHRIS HOPKINS, AND BRIAN MURRAY​ 
* CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS - COLLECTIVELY OWN OR EXERCISE CONTROL OR DIRECTION OVER MORE THAN 5% OF COMMON SHARES OF ALEXANDRIA 
* CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS - CONCERNED SHAREHOLDERS COMPRISE OF, AMONG OTHERS, CEO OF ALEXANDRIA MINERALS ERIC OWENS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
